TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates information about an HTTP request that matches a defined route.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> class contains information about the HTTP request in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.HttpContext%2A> property. It contains information about the route that matched the current request in the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext.RouteData%2A> property.
When you construct a URL from a route, you pass an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RequestContext> class to the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

An object that contains information about the route that matched the current request.
